37 #include <moveit/planning_scene_interface/planning_scene_interface.h>
38 #include <moveit/move_group/capability_names.h>
39 #include <moveit_msgs/GetPlanningScene.h>
40 #include <moveit_msgs/ApplyPlanningScene.h>
41 #include <ros/ros.h>
42 #include <algorithm>
43 
44 namespace moveit
45 {
46 namespace planning_interface
47 {
48 static const std::string LOGNAME = "planning_scene_interface";
49 
50 class PlanningSceneInterface::PlanningSceneInterfaceImpl
51 {
52 public:
53  explicit PlanningSceneInterfaceImpl(const std::string& ns = "", bool wait = true)
54  {
55  node_handle_ = ros::NodeHandle(ns);
56  planning_scene_diff_publisher_ = node_handle_.advertise<moveit_msgs::PlanningScene>("planning_scene", 1);
57  planning_scene_service_ =
58  node_handle_.serviceClient<moveit_msgs::GetPlanningScene>(move_group::GET_PLANNING_SCENE_SERVICE_NAME);
59  apply_planning_scene_service_ =
60  node_handle_.serviceClient<moveit_msgs::ApplyPlanningScene>(move_group::APPLY_PLANNING_SCENE_SERVICE_NAME);
61 
62  if (wait)
63  {
64  waitForService(planning_scene_service_);
65  waitForService(apply_planning_scene_service_);
66  }
67  else
68  {
69  if (!planning_scene_service_.exists() || !apply_planning_scene_service_.exists())
70  {
71  throw std::runtime_error("ROS services not available");
72  }
73  }
74  }
75 
76  std::vector<std::string> getKnownObjectNames(bool with_type)
77  {
78  moveit_msgs::GetPlanningScene::Request request;
79  moveit_msgs::GetPlanningScene::Response response;
80  std::vector<std::string> result;
81  request.components.components = request.components.WORLD_OBJECT_NAMES;
82  if (!planning_scene_service_.call(request, response))
83  return result;
84  if (with_type)
85  {
86  for (const moveit_msgs::CollisionObject& collision_object : response.scene.world.collision_objects)
87  if (!collision_object.type.key.empty())
88  result.push_back(collision_object.id);
89  }
90  else
91  {
92  for (const moveit_msgs::CollisionObject& collision_object : response.scene.world.collision_objects)
93  result.push_back(collision_object.id);
94  }
95  return result;
96  }
97 
98  std::vector<std::string> getKnownObjectNamesInROI(double minx, double miny, double minz, double maxx, double maxy,
99  double maxz, bool with_type, std::vector<std::string>& types)
100  {
101  moveit_msgs::GetPlanningScene::Request request;
102  moveit_msgs::GetPlanningScene::Response response;
103  std::vector<std::string> result;
104  request.components.components = request.components.WORLD_OBJECT_GEOMETRY;
105  if (!planning_scene_service_.call(request, response))
106  {
107  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Could not call planning scene service to get object names");
108  return result;
109  }
110 
111  for (const moveit_msgs::CollisionObject& collision_object : response.scene.world.collision_objects)
112  {
113  if (with_type && collision_object.type.key.empty())
114  continue;
115  if (collision_object.mesh_poses.empty() && collision_object.primitive_poses.empty())
116  continue;
117  bool good = true;
118  for (const geometry_msgs::Pose& mesh_pose : collision_object.mesh_poses)
119  if (!(mesh_pose.position.x >= minx && mesh_pose.position.x <= maxx && mesh_pose.position.y >= miny &&
120  mesh_pose.position.y <= maxy && mesh_pose.position.z >= minz && mesh_pose.position.z <= maxz))
121  {
122  good = false;
123  break;
124  }
125  for (const geometry_msgs::Pose& primitive_pose : collision_object.primitive_poses)
126  if (!(primitive_pose.position.x >= minx && primitive_pose.position.x <= maxx &&
127  primitive_pose.position.y >= miny && primitive_pose.position.y <= maxy &&
128  primitive_pose.position.z >= minz && primitive_pose.position.z <= maxz))
129  {
130  good = false;
131  break;
132  }
133  if (good)
134  {
135  result.push_back(collision_object.id);
136  if (with_type)
137  types.push_back(collision_object.type.key);
138  }
139  }
140  return result;
141  }
142 
143  std::map<std::string, geometry_msgs::Pose> getObjectPoses(const std::vector<std::string>& object_ids)
144  {
145  moveit_msgs::GetPlanningScene::Request request;
146  moveit_msgs::GetPlanningScene::Response response;
147  std::map<std::string, geometry_msgs::Pose> result;
148  request.components.components = request.components.WORLD_OBJECT_GEOMETRY;
149  if (!planning_scene_service_.call(request, response))
150  {
151  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Could not call planning scene service to get object names");
152  return result;
153  }
154 
155  for (const moveit_msgs::CollisionObject& collision_object : response.scene.world.collision_objects)
156  {
157  if (std::find(object_ids.begin(), object_ids.end(), collision_object.id) != object_ids.end())
158  {
159  result[collision_object.id] = collision_object.pose;
160  }
161  }
162  return result;
163  }
164 
165  std::map<std::string, moveit_msgs::CollisionObject> getObjects(const std::vector<std::string>& object_ids)
166  {
167  moveit_msgs::GetPlanningScene::Request request;
168  moveit_msgs::GetPlanningScene::Response response;
169  std::map<std::string, moveit_msgs::CollisionObject> result;
170  request.components.components = request.components.WORLD_OBJECT_GEOMETRY;
171  if (!planning_scene_service_.call(request, response))
172  {
173  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Could not call planning scene service to get object geometries");
174  return result;
175  }
176 
177  for (const moveit_msgs::CollisionObject& collision_object : response.scene.world.collision_objects)
178  {
179  if (object_ids.empty() || std::find(object_ids.begin(), object_ids.end(), collision_object.id) != object_ids.end())
180  {
181  result[collision_object.id] = collision_object;
182  }
183  }
184  return result;
185  }
186 
187  std::map<std::string, moveit_msgs::AttachedCollisionObject>
188  getAttachedObjects(const std::vector<std::string>& object_ids)
189  {
190  moveit_msgs::GetPlanningScene::Request request;
191  moveit_msgs::GetPlanningScene::Response response;
192  std::map<std::string, moveit_msgs::AttachedCollisionObject> result;
193  request.components.components = request.components.ROBOT_STATE_ATTACHED_OBJECTS;
194  if (!planning_scene_service_.call(request, response))
195  {
196  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Could not call planning scene service to get attached object geometries");
197  return result;
198  }
199 
200  for (const moveit_msgs::AttachedCollisionObject& attached_collision_object :
201  response.scene.robot_state.attached_collision_objects)
202  {
203  if (object_ids.empty() ||
204  std::find(object_ids.begin(), object_ids.end(), attached_collision_object.object.id) != object_ids.end())
205  {
206  result[attached_collision_object.object.id] = attached_collision_object;
207  }
208  }
209  return result;
210  }
211 
212  bool applyPlanningScene(const moveit_msgs::PlanningScene& planning_scene)
213  {
214  moveit_msgs::ApplyPlanningScene::Request request;
215  moveit_msgs::ApplyPlanningScene::Response response;
216  request.scene = planning_scene;
217  if (!apply_planning_scene_service_.call(request, response))
218  {
219  ROS_WARN_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Failed to call ApplyPlanningScene service");
220  return false;
221  }
222  return response.success;
223  }
224 
225  void addCollisionObjects(const std::vector<moveit_msgs::CollisionObject>& collision_objects,
226  const std::vector<moveit_msgs::ObjectColor>& object_colors) const
227  {
228  moveit_msgs::PlanningScene planning_scene;
229  planning_scene.world.collision_objects = collision_objects;
230  planning_scene.object_colors = object_colors;
231 
232  for (size_t i = 0; i < planning_scene.object_colors.size(); ++i)
233  {
234  if (planning_scene.object_colors[i].id.empty() && i < collision_objects.size())
235  planning_scene.object_colors[i].id = collision_objects[i].id;
236  else
237  break;
238  }
239 
240  planning_scene.is_diff = true;
241  planning_scene_diff_publisher_.publish(planning_scene);
242  }
243 
244  void removeCollisionObjects(const std::vector<std::string>& object_ids) const
245  {
246  moveit_msgs::PlanningScene planning_scene;
247  moveit_msgs::CollisionObject object;
248  for (const std::string& object_id : object_ids)
249  {
250  object.id = object_id;
251  object.operation = object.REMOVE;
252  planning_scene.world.collision_objects.push_back(object);
253  }
254  planning_scene.is_diff = true;
255  planning_scene_diff_publisher_.publish(planning_scene);
256  }
257 
258 private:
259  void waitForService(ros::ServiceClient& srv)
260  {
261  ros::Duration time_before_warning(5.0);
262  srv.waitForExistence(time_before_warning);
263  if (!srv.exists())
264  {
265  ROS_WARN_STREAM_NAMED(LOGNAME, "service '" << srv.getService() << "' not advertised yet. Continue waiting...");
266  srv.waitForExistence();
267  }
268  }
269 
270  ros::NodeHandle node_handle_;
271  ros::ServiceClient planning_scene_service_;
272  ros::ServiceClient apply_planning_scene_service_;
273  ros::Publisher planning_scene_diff_publisher_;
274  moveit::core::RobotModelConstPtr robot_model_;
275 };
276 
277 PlanningSceneInterface::PlanningSceneInterface(const std::string& ns, bool wait)
278 {
279  impl_ = new PlanningSceneInterfaceImpl(ns, wait);
280 }
281 
282 PlanningSceneInterface::~PlanningSceneInterface()
283 {
284  delete impl_;
285 }
286 
287 std::vector<std::string> PlanningSceneInterface::getKnownObjectNames(bool with_type)
288 {
289  return impl_->getKnownObjectNames(with_type);
290 }

294  bool with_type,
295  std::vector<std::string>& types)
296 {

298 }

312 std::map<std::string, moveit_msgs::AttachedCollisionObject>

317 
318 bool PlanningSceneInterface::applyCollisionObject(const moveit_msgs::CollisionObject& collision_object)
319 {
320  moveit_msgs::PlanningScene ps;
321  ps.robot_state.is_diff = true;
322  ps.is_diff = true;
323  ps.world.collision_objects.reserve(1);
324  ps.world.collision_objects.push_back(collision_object);
325  return applyPlanningScene(ps);
326 }
327 
328 bool PlanningSceneInterface::applyCollisionObject(const moveit_msgs::CollisionObject& collision_object,
329  const std_msgs::ColorRGBA& object_color)
330 {
331  moveit_msgs::PlanningScene ps;
332  ps.robot_state.is_diff = true;
333  ps.is_diff = true;
334  ps.world.collision_objects.reserve(1);
335  ps.world.collision_objects.push_back(collision_object);
336  moveit_msgs::ObjectColor oc;
337  oc.id = collision_object.id;
338  oc.color = object_color;
339  ps.object_colors.push_back(oc);
340  return applyPlanningScene(ps);
341 }
342 
343 bool PlanningSceneInterface::applyCollisionObjects(const std::vector<moveit_msgs::CollisionObject>& collision_objects,
344  const std::vector<moveit_msgs::ObjectColor>& object_colors)
345 {
346  moveit_msgs::PlanningScene ps;
347  ps.robot_state.is_diff = true;
348  ps.is_diff = true;
349  ps.world.collision_objects = collision_objects;
350  ps.object_colors = object_colors;
351 
352  for (size_t i = 0; i < ps.object_colors.size(); ++i)
353  {
354  if (ps.object_colors[i].id.empty() && i < collision_objects.size())
355  ps.object_colors[i].id = collision_objects[i].id;
356  else
357  break;
358  }
359 
360  return applyPlanningScene(ps);
361 }
362 
363 bool PlanningSceneInterface::applyAttachedCollisionObject(const moveit_msgs::AttachedCollisionObject& collision_object)
364 {
365  moveit_msgs::PlanningScene ps;
366  ps.robot_state.is_diff = true;
367  ps.is_diff = true;
368  ps.robot_state.attached_collision_objects.reserve(1);
369  ps.robot_state.attached_collision_objects.push_back(collision_object);
370  return applyPlanningScene(ps);
371 }
372 
373 bool PlanningSceneInterface::applyAttachedCollisionObjects(
374  const std::vector<moveit_msgs::AttachedCollisionObject>& collision_objects)
375 {
376  moveit_msgs::PlanningScene ps;
377  ps.robot_state.is_diff = true;
378  ps.is_diff = true;
379  ps.robot_state.attached_collision_objects = collision_objects;
380  return applyPlanningScene(ps);
381 }
382 
383 bool PlanningSceneInterface::applyPlanningScene(const moveit_msgs::PlanningScene& ps)
384 {
385  return impl_->applyPlanningScene(ps);
386 }
387 
388 void PlanningSceneInterface::addCollisionObjects(const std::vector<moveit_msgs::CollisionObject>& collision_objects,
389  const std::vector<moveit_msgs::ObjectColor>& object_colors) const
390 {
391  impl_->addCollisionObjects(collision_objects, object_colors);
392 }
393 
394 void PlanningSceneInterface::removeCollisionObjects(const std::vector<std::string>& object_ids) const
395 {
396  impl_->removeCollisionObjects(object_ids);
397 }
